text: What language are you making post requests in? There are several libraries available to use that make working with the API relatively easy. :slightly_smiling_face:

Looks like they have one for Node, PHP, Ruby and Python.
This would be a good place to start
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/overview>

Then you'll want to check out the different endpoints that you can post to. For example, here you'll find all the endpoints for the Contact CRM object.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>

Click on the endpoints tab. And you'll see there's ones for listing associations and making associations.
